‎你跟我说过 想回去做教练

translation.en: Well, here I am delivering him for no money.
And it's not gonna happen?
I pay you to find players, not tell me what to do with them.
translation.zh:
‎我是花钱请你找球员
‎不是让你告诉我怎么使用他们

translation.en: Pay me.
You got something to say, Stan?
[Bo] I don't understand.
[Stanley] It's all good. It's just they don't have a roster spot at the moment,
translation.zh: ‎没事 他们只是暂时没有名额

translation.en: but they love what they saw and want to see more.
translation.zh:
‎但他们很满意你的表现
‎他们想看你继续表现

translation.en: And let's just say a spot doesn't open up,
we'll get your name in the draft.
So you play like you did yesterday, at the combine, you'll be a lock.
translation.zh:
‎你在联合选秀时
‎像昨天那样表现就行了 肯定能行

translation.en: They still pay me to come.
They'll pay you for sure.
translation.zh: ‎他们会付你钱的 放心吧

translation.en: It might not come at once, but you'll get the money.
translation.zh: ‎也许不会马上给钱 但你会拿到钱的

translation.en: -I promise you. -Okay.
Giant body like yours on an eight-hour flight is gonna be rough.
translation.zh:
‎你身材魁梧
‎坐八个小时的飞机会很辛苦

translation.en: You'll take my seat, okay?
-Oh, really? -Okay. Yeah, no problem.
[on PA] This is your captain speaking.
I'd like to welcome everyone aboard Flight 718. We're currently cruising at…
translation.zh: ‎欢迎各位搭乘718号航班 ‎我们正以一万米的高度巡航

translation.en: [whispering] Psst, Stanley. Stanley. Here.
Look what I got.
-[Stanley] Oh, yes. -They are warm.
-That's good. -You want some?
Uh… I don't want to start a riot back here. It's cool, thanks.
translation.zh: ‎嗯…我不想引起众怒 ‎不用了 谢谢

translation.en: -One bite? -No, I'm trying not to, badly.
translation.zh:
‎-咬一口吧
‎-不用了 我… ‎我在尽力忍着 很辛苦

translation.en: -It's really good. -Just give me a fucking roll. Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎真的很好吃 ‎给我个面包卷就行了 谢谢

translation.en: [man] Next, please.
translation.zh: ‎（美国海关与边境保护局） ‎下一位

translation.en: [officer] Sir, I need you to come with me.
Oh, hey, that's my kid.
Yo, excuse me. No, no, he's with me. He's with me.
translation.zh: ‎喂！ ‎听我说！不要！ ‎他跟我一起的

translation.en: What's up, Oscar? What happened?
translation.zh: ‎怎么了 奥斯卡？怎么回事？

translation.en: He got flagged for an aggravated assault charge.
Beat up a guy pretty bad five years ago.
-Ah, Jesus. -He needs to be very careful.
He goes in front of a judge for even running a stop sign,
translation.zh:
‎一旦犯了任何事上了法庭
‎哪怕只是闯红灯

translation.en: he can get his visa permanently revoked.
Right. Okay.
Are you looking at him for the draft?
Yeah. We're all very excited about him. This is something I should have caught.
translation.zh: ‎是的 我们非常看好他 ‎但我应该早点发现的

translation.en: I don't want the team paying for my mistake.
translation.zh: ‎我不想让球队为我的错误买单

translation.en: So keep this between us. I'll cover your hours.
translation.zh:
‎所以…这件事别说出去 ‎-我会给你报酬的
‎-行 没问题

translation.en: No problem. Just bring us back home a championship, right?
translation.zh:
‎-我会给你报酬的
‎-行 没问题 ‎为我们拿个冠军回来

translation.en: -Will do, Oscar. -Good. Thank you.
Anything else you need to tell me? Now is the time.
translation.zh: ‎还有什么要告诉我的 现在就说

translation.en: We all have stuff from our past,
but having a criminal record's a pretty big detail to leave out.
translation.zh: ‎我们都犯过错 ‎但犯罪记录是大事 你不该瞒着我

translation.en: [sighs] No more secrets from now on, all right?
translation.zh: ‎以后别再有事瞒着我了 好吗？

translation.en: No big deal, moving on.
I got you this,
for local and international calls.
translation.zh: ‎可以拨打本地电话和国际长途

translation.en: You can talk to your daughter anytime.
-Thanks, Stanley. -Philadelphia, baby.
translation.zh: ‎谢了 斯坦利 ‎你会喜欢费城的

translation.en: You're gonna love it. Best sports fans in the world.
translation.zh: ‎你会喜欢费城的 ‎这里有全世界最棒的球迷

translation.en: Actually the worst, but that's what makes 'em the best.
translation.zh:
‎其实是最差劲的
‎但正因为如此 他们是最棒的

[Stanley] Yeah. He wanted to call his daughter.

‎-他一个人住在酒店？
‎-是的 ‎他想给他女儿打电话
‎我给了他一些钱 让他安顿下来

translation.en: I gave him money. He's settling in.
translation.zh:
‎他想给他女儿打电话
‎我给了他一些钱 让他安顿下来

translation.zh:
‎好吧 那你什么时候带这个…
‎他叫什么名字来着？

translation.en: Bo Cruz.
When are you taking Bo across the river to train with the team?
translation.zh:
‎博·克鲁兹 ‎你什么时候带阿博过河
‎跟球队一起训练？

translation.en: I don't know if I want to give them this guy yet.

What?
The Sixers don't know you stashed him.
translation.zh: ‎76人队不知道你把他藏起来了

translation.en: You don't get it. The kid is like if Scottie Pippen and a wolf had a baby.

translation.en: So what are you saying? He has a hairy face.
translation.zh: ‎你什么意思？他脸上长满了毛吗？

translation.en: I'm saying if this kid puts it together,
when he puts it together, he will be top ten in the league.

translation.en: And being the guy who finds the guy matters in this business.
-Won't Vince fire you for this? -T…
translation.zh: ‎你就不怕文斯开除你吗？ ‎阿特

translation.en: The kid is… special.
Okay.
With the cheese or with the whole thing?
Yeah?
You should have stopped me again. This is fucking atrocious.
translation.zh: ‎你应该拦着我的 太难吃了

translation.en: Yeah.
You're looking for the big man? He ain't here.
-Where is he? -Make a right on 13th.
Hey, what are you doing?
-[crowd exclaims] -Careful, please.
All right, that's it. That's it.
Take your money. Goodness.
I see. We're not here to hustle, man.

translation.en: Why not?
Let's go.
Good Lord.
-Why? -[Bo] Hey, Stanley.
Have you ever tried these Ishkabibble's? Oh, my God. [sniffs]

translation.en: Yeah, but you got five cheese steaks.

[Stanley] But you only took one bite of each one.
You take one bite and you don't eat it all, because if not, you get fat.

-Come on, Stanley, I don't say that. -Okay.

‎-得了吧 斯坦利 我没那么说
‎-好吧

[Bo] Sixers are paying, don't worry.
translation.zh: ‎反正是76人队付钱 别担心

translation.zh:
‎是的 但你…
‎我们不会吃九美元的品客薯片 ‎做人要讲规矩

translation.zh: ‎我只吃了一片 不怎么好吃

translation.en: It's still $9. They don't charge you per chip.

translation.en: Okay. Anyways, I got some good news.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 总之 ‎我有一些好消息

translation.zh:
‎-我的老朋友利昂·里奇
‎-森林狼那个？

translation.en: Right. We played together in college.
translation.zh: ‎是的 我们读大学时曾一起打球

translation.en: Like, who are these guys?
College kids. NBA prospects getting ready for the draft.
translation.zh:
‎-什么人？
‎-几个大学生 ‎他们有望进入NBA 在为选秀做准备

No, no, no.
It's just a showcase, not a big deal, just a step in the process.

translation.en: The whole idea is to give young bucks a place to shine.

translation.en: So you're just gonna go out there, and you're gonna shine, Bo Cruz.

♪ What you want now? I'm the one now ♪
[Vin] Stanley.
Come here.
-Hey, Matisse, Kyle. -'Sup?
Bo. This is Vin Merrick. He's co-owner of the Sixers,

‎但球队基本上是他在管

translation.en: but he basically runs the team.
translation.zh:
‎他是76人队的共同所有人
‎但球队基本上是他在管

translation.en: And Leon Rich, basically, he runs the world.

‎他去机场接的你

-How you know he's talking about you? -Come on.

‎-你怎么知道他在说你？
‎-得了吧 兄弟

translation.en: Sorry, but I had to bring him.

translation.en: Good luck.
Appreciate it.
Fellas.

‎克米特·威尔茨来干什么？
‎他不是第二轮人选吗？

translation.en: [Stanley] He can shoot from anywhere. Just stay with him wherever he goes.

‎别让他大量得分
‎别让他兴奋起来 懂吗？

‎他是来炫耀技术的

‎如果你能防住克米特·威尔茨

Best of luck out there, man.
-What's your name? -Bo.
Bo. I like that. Strong, strong like a bull.

translation.en: Let's give these people a show. What do you say, Bo?

Spain.
Shit sounds wack.
Y'all like bull fights over there, right?

translation.en: So, here's what's going to happen. You're the bull.

translation.en: I'm the motherfucker with a cape running your big dumb ass in circles. That's cool.
translation.zh: ‎你是牛 我是身披斗篷的斗牛士 ‎让你这个傻大个不停地兜圈 那很酷

translation.en: Let's get it.
Get up on him, baby.
Stay with him.
We're good.
Right here.
Go ahead, make something happen.
That's it. Yes, sir.
-Who's this? -Stan brought him.
[Stanley] Nice vision.
Welcome to America.
-Hey, hey. -[players speaking indistinctly]

‎-嘿 把球给我
‎-嘿！ ‎-让开
‎-嘿 伙计 我没事 不用帮忙

translation.en: I don't need no help.
translation.zh:
‎-让开
‎-嘿 伙计 我没事 不用帮忙

translation.en: That's it. Nice.
I like-- I like him. I like him.
This is gonna be good.
translation.zh:
‎-这下有好戏看了 他们两个
‎-嗯

translation.en: He's got a lot of length. Does he have any control?

translation.en: -Yeah! -[Stanley] Nice swat! Way to get after it.

translation.en: Good D.
Finna hit you with a hazy, cross sidestep.
Think you can stop me?
Yeah!
Stan's kid getting a lesson here.
You're good. Don't come over here.
-Shit. -He's like a giraffe on roller skates.

translation.en: Shake that off. Shake it off.
You get it, right?
Step back three. Really can't guard me, bro.
Damn, you slow.
-Hey, let's take a seat for a minute. -No.
Just give yourself a breather.
[Kermit] Listen to him. Listen to your daddy.

translation.en: Here comes a brick.
Oh, yeah!
You can see it's getting to his head.
-Oh! It's okay. -I think the game's too fast for him.
Nothing.
Move out the way. All right, kid.

‎-没人传球给他
‎-好了 孩子

translation.en: Olé, bitch!
Shit.
He had his moments. I saw it.
translation.zh: ‎他有一段打得不错 我看到了

translation.en: That wasn't him. That wasn't even close to him.
translation.zh:
‎那不是他的水平
‎他完全没有发挥出来

translation.en: [sighs] It's my fault. I rushed this whole thing.
Remember our freshman year, we were playing at Gonzaga,
translation.zh:
‎还记得我们读大一的时候
‎跟贡萨加大学队的比赛吗？

translation.en: they put John Stockton on me?
translation.zh:
‎他们让我防守约翰·斯托克顿
‎你让我当心他

translation.en: You said watch out for this guy. I said nobody looking like
translation.zh:
‎他们让我防守约翰·斯托克顿
‎你让我当心他 ‎我说：“一个长得像卖保险的家伙
‎不可能突破我的防守”

translation.en: an insurance salesman going to bust my ass.
translation.zh:
‎我说：“一个长得像卖保险的家伙
‎不可能突破我的防守”

translation.en: Midway through the second half, 20 points, 20 assists.
translation.zh:
‎下半场打到一半的时候 ‎他得了20分 20次助攻
‎你们都不肯看我 还记得吗？

translation.en: -None of y'all would look at me. Remember? -I remember.
translation.zh:
‎他得了20分 20次助攻
‎你们都不肯看我 还记得吗？ ‎当然记得

translation.en: Remember me playing like that again?
translation.zh: ‎我后来还打得那么差劲过吗？

translation.en: No, 'cause I never wanted to feel that feeling again.
translation.zh: ‎没有 因为我不想再尝到那种滋味

translation.en: So tonight's a good thing.
Nothing was good about tonight.
That was some awful… [laughing]
-Wanna grab some din-din? -I got to catch a plane.
You're gonna have to pick up the tab on the Spanish kid. I'm not interested.
translation.zh:
‎那个西班牙孩子的费用由你出
‎斯坦 我对他没兴趣

translation.en: Time to get back out there and keep looking.
You're gonna miss another one of your daughter's birthdays.

translation.en: The Sixers will send something nice for her.
translation.zh: ‎不过球队会送她生日礼物的

translation.en: Hey, I never asked you to pick up the tab on him, Vincent.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 ‎我没说过让你承担他的费用 文森特

translation.en: Frankly, I'm not interested
translation.zh: ‎坦白说 我没兴趣为一个自以为是的

translation.en: in working for a smug, born-on-third fucking bitch.
translation.zh: ‎坦白说 我没兴趣为一个自以为是的 ‎富二代贱人打工

translation.en: So how's this?
Kiss my fat ass, and fuck your five-star hotels.

‎给我舔屁股
‎让你的五星级酒店见鬼去吧

translation.en: I quit.
So Stanley's not coming to dinner?
-I really wish he was now. -[laughter]
[Blake] Stanley knows how to fuck up his life.

translation.en: Another bad decision in the books.
The combine's in six weeks.

translation.en: Can you get my guy in?
I'll work on it.
Don't have a heart attack, man. Come on, 22.

translation.en: I fly home tomorrow.
Is that what you want to do?
You come all this way, have one bad day, and you're ready to back down?
translation.zh:
‎你大老远来了
‎受了一点挫折 就想打退堂鼓？

translation.en: -No, but I suck. -Do you love this game?
translation.zh: ‎不是 但我太差劲了 ‎你热爱篮球吗？

translation.en: Love it with your whole heart?
Because if you don't, let's not even bother.
translation.zh: ‎如果你不热爱 ‎我们就别费劲了

translation.en: Let's not open that door. They're gonna slam it right in our face.
translation.zh: ‎我们就别试了 免得被他们羞辱

translation.en: I love this game. I live this game.
translation.zh: ‎我热爱篮球 篮球就是我的生命

translation.en: And there's 1,000 other guys waiting in the wings who are obsessed with this game.
translation.zh: ‎还有一千个痴迷篮球的人等着想加入

translation.en: Obsession is gonna beat talent every time.
You've got all the talent in the world, but are you obsessed?
translation.zh: ‎你很有天分 但你痴迷吗？

translation.en: Is it all you ever think about?
Let's face it, it's you against you out there.
translation.zh: ‎面对现实吧 你的对手是你自己

translation.en: When you walk on that court, you have to think, "I am the best guy out there."

translation.en: "I don't care if LeBron's playing."
So let me ask you again. Do you love this game?
translation.zh: ‎所以我再问你一次 ‎你热爱篮球吗？

translation.en: Yes.
Is there a newborn kitten purring in here right now?
translation.zh: ‎你是刚出生的小猫在喵喵叫吗？

translation.en: I couldn't hear you.
-[shouts] Do you want to be in the NBA? -Yes!
Let's make that happen.
Never back down.
Hello.
[Stanley] Buenos días, Bo Cruz. I'm out front.
translation.zh: ‎早上好 博·克鲁兹 我在大门外

translation.en: Stanley, it's 4:10, man.
[Stanley] Come on downstairs. Bring your shit.
translation.zh: ‎快点下来 带上你的东西

translation.zh:
‎以前科比是凌晨4点起床
‎赶在开始训练前进行训练

translation.en: I got you a gift.
-Kobes. -That's right, for inspiration.

translation.en: -Let's get to work. -[engine starts]

‎距离联合选秀还有一个半月
‎那场比赛会电视直播

translation.zh:
‎距离联合选秀还有一个半月
‎那场比赛会电视直播 ‎全世界的人都会看你打球

translation.en: We got to get you ready.
So you see this hill?

translation.zh: ‎你知道我有多喜欢这样 ‎勤奋工作 宝贝

translation.en: I knew when I saw you. That's a hardworking fool.
translation.zh:
‎勤奋工作 宝贝 ‎我第一眼见到你
‎就知道你是个勤奋的笨蛋

translation.en: -You're going somewhere. -[Bo] We're going together.
translation.zh:
‎你会有成就的 ‎我们一起成就
‎-我们一起成就

translation.en: [Stanley] We're going together. Whoo!
translation.zh:
‎我们一起成就
‎-我们一起成就

translation.en: Okay, good. Look around. Who's open? Be patient. Now! Attack! Go! Go! Go!
translation.zh: ‎好的 看看四周 ‎谁没人防守？耐心点 出手！进攻！ ‎上！好的 撤退 对 很好

translation.en: Okay, retreat. Yeah, that's good, man. That's it. Wait.
translation.zh:
‎上！好的 撤退 对 很好 ‎很好 等等 你会找到时机的
‎你会冲到篮下的

translation.en: You'll find times you go down there, and nothing's open, wait, you'll find it.
translation.zh:
‎很好 等等 你会找到时机的
‎你会冲到篮下的 ‎不过先等等 你会找到时机的

translation.en: You're hot, baby! You're hot.
Bo Cruz coming down!
-Low, yeah-- -Gotta make passes under pressure.
translation.zh: ‎低点 对… ‎要能在压力下传球 很好！

translation.en: That's it! Okay, nice. We're cooking. Last one.
translation.zh: ‎要能在压力下传球 很好！ ‎好 不错 漂亮 最后一个

translation.en: Push it! Get into the next gear! Go! Go! Go!
Jimmy Butler's up on you. Now what? Now what?
translation.zh: ‎吉米·巴特勒在防守你 怎么办？

translation.en: We're doing this 'cause nobody else is doing this. Come on! Whoo!
translation.zh:
‎我们这样做
‎是因为没人这样做 来吧！

translation.en: That's it. Back. Pass.
translation.zh:
‎-很好 后退 传球
‎-加油 阿博

translation.en: Let's go, Bo. Finish that. Come on now, Bo!
translation.zh:
‎-很好 后退 传球
‎-加油 阿博 ‎-完成那个 来吧 阿博！
‎-很好 传球！好样的 阿博！

translation.en: Good, Bo! Yeah, Bo! Use that clock! Use that clock!
translation.zh:
‎-完成那个 来吧 阿博！
‎-很好 传球！好样的 阿博！ ‎用那个钟！找一个投篮手！

translation.en: Find a shooter! That's it! Hit that!
translation.zh: ‎用那个钟！找一个投篮手！ ‎很好！投篮！

translation.en: You're ahead, baby! Now!
On your right! Kick his ass!
Leave him in the dust! That's right!
Drive! Drive! Drive! Drive! Drive!
Yeah! Yeah, suck it, baby!
Go! You're gonna get this! You're gonna get this!
That's it, brother! Yes, sir!
Minute forty-four with room to spare, baby! Yes!
translation.zh: ‎1分44秒 比目标还要快！好样的！

translation.en: The Cruz Missile!
You know you like that!
Look at him go!
That a baby!
[Bo] Stanley!
We did it!
[Stanley] Yeah! Rocky!
-[Bo] Yeah! -[Stanley] Love it!
[Stanley] For God's sake, get the kid more butter.
translation.zh: ‎（他已经准备好干翻他们了！） ‎看在老天的份上 多给他一点黄油

translation.en: I mean, it's almost the whole stick of butter.
-[laughing] -Hey.
translation.zh: ‎已经几乎是一整条黄油了 ‎嘿

translation.en: What do you think of the Cruz Missile as a nickname for--
translation.zh: ‎你觉得科鲁兹导弹这个绰号怎么样…

translation.en: -The Cruz-- -He doesn't like it.
That nickname is stupid.
translation.zh:
‎-他不喜欢
‎-这个绰号太难听了

translation.en: -He says it's stupid. -[laughter]
[Teresa] Don't be rude.
-So, do you have any pictures of Lucia? -I miss her so much.
translation.zh: ‎你有露西娅的照片吗？ ‎我很想她

translation.en: She has your eyes.
Yeah. She does. They're beautiful.
Easy, tiger.
-[all chuckle] -No.
So, have you ever been away from her this long?
-I've never been away from her. -Never? Oh, my goodness.
translation.zh: ‎我跟她从没分开过 ‎从未分开过 老天

translation.en: So, anyway, Mrs. Sugerman, tell me how you met this guy.
translation.zh: ‎苏格曼太太 你跟他是怎么认识的？

translation.en: -"How'd she become so lucky?" He's asking. -Okay. All right. Story time.
translation.zh:
‎-他是问你怎么这么好运
‎-好吧 讲故事时间

translation.en: So, I was on the women's track team, and we had a meet at Virginia Tech,
translation.zh: ‎当时我是女子田径队的 ‎我们去弗吉尼亚理工学院参加比赛

translation.en: and it was the same time that the men's basketball team had a game.
translation.zh: ‎正好男子篮球队也有一场比赛

translation.en: And, unfortunately for us, our bus broke down. So…
translation.zh: ‎很不幸 我们的巴士抛锚了

translation.en: Mm-hmm. I paid the bus driver.
We had to bum a ride home with those fools.
translation.zh: ‎我们只能搭那些笨蛋的车回家

translation.en: Stanley sat next to me for three hours, the entire ride home,
translation.zh: ‎斯坦利在我旁边坐了三个小时 ‎全程一句话都没对我说

translation.en: and he didn't say one word.
I didn't think she wanted to talk to me. I was scared.
translation.zh: ‎我以为她不想跟我说话 我很害怕

translation.en: And then, as everybody is walking off,
translation.zh: ‎然后当大家下车时 他突然大声说

translation.en: he just says crazy loud, "One day, I'm gonna marry you,
translation.zh: ‎然后当大家下车时 他突然大声说 ‎“有一天 我要娶你

translation.en: and we're gonna have very athletic children!"
translation.zh:
‎我们将生一堆
‎非常有运动细胞的孩子！”

translation.en: -I'm like, "What?" -You really say that?
I did. Yeah, it worked. Right? Look, I do. We both have a…
translation.zh:
‎是的 很管用 对吧？ ‎你瞧 我做到了 我们有一个…
‎虽然完全没有运动细胞…

translation.en: -Well, not athletic at all-- -Hey! What the heck?
translation.zh:
‎你瞧 我做到了 我们有一个…
‎虽然完全没有运动细胞… ‎-嘿！搞什么？
‎-不过…

translation.en: -Not even badminton. Not Frisbee. -[Alex] Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-连羽毛球和飞盘都不会
‎-好吧

translation.en: Playing checkers, she falls down.
-I'm just saying. -[Teresa] Oh, my God.
-[Alex] Oh, my God! -That was when you played at Temple?
translation.zh: ‎天啊！ ‎当时你在天普大学打球？

translation.en: I played at Temple. Yeah. How'd you know that?
translation.zh:
‎我在天普大学打球
‎没错 你是怎么知道的？

translation.en: Come on, Stanley. You follow me to my home,
translation.zh: ‎拜托 斯坦利 你跟踪我回家

translation.en: offer me, like, crazy money,
you don't think I'll look you up on Internet?
translation.zh: ‎你以为我不会上网查你的底细吗？

translation.en: Number 22. Double Deuce.
Somebody did his homework, unlike somebody else.
translation.zh: ‎有人做了功课 不像有些人

translation.en: Well, Stan can ball. You do know he can handle the rock.
translation.zh:
‎斯坦打球很厉害的 ‎-你知道他打球很厉害吧？
‎-我…不

translation.en: -Stanley? -If he didn't get hurt,
translation.zh:
‎-斯坦利？
‎-如果他没受伤 就不是现在这样了

translation.en: -it'd have been a different story. -Who wants coffee?
translation.zh:
‎-斯坦利？
‎-如果他没受伤 就不是现在这样了 ‎谁想喝咖啡？
‎你想喝吗？我去泡咖啡

translation.en: -You want coffee? I'll get coffee. -Spanish coffee, please.
translation.zh:
‎谁想喝咖啡？
‎你想喝吗？我去泡咖啡 ‎-我要西班牙咖啡 谢谢
‎-好的

translation.en: [Stanley] Okay. I'm gonna go to Spain. I'll be right back, guys.
translation.zh:
‎-我要西班牙咖啡 谢谢
‎-好的 ‎我去趟西班牙 马上就回来

translation.en: Yo. Leon. Thanks for getting back so quickly.
translation.zh: ‎喂 利昂 谢谢你这么快回我电话

translation.en: [Leon] I'm sorry. The list is locked.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 抱歉 名单已经锁定了

translation.en: [Stanley] What? I thought you said you could get it done.
translation.zh: ‎什么意思？你不是说你能搞定吗？

translation.en: You should've told me about all this shit before I called all around the league,
translation.zh:
‎听着 你应该早点告诉我那件事 ‎害得我到处
‎给联盟的人打电话 替他担保

translation.en: vouching for this guy.
translation.zh:
‎害得我到处
‎给联盟的人打电话 替他担保

translation.en: Shit. What? What shit you talking about?
He's got an assault charge. And Vince is all over TV talking about it.
translation.zh:
‎他遭到过伤人指控
‎文斯正在电视上大谈这件事

translation.en: [Anthony] And joining us now, the co-owner of the 76ers, Vince Merrick.
translation.zh:
‎我们请来了76人队的
‎共同所有人文斯·梅里克

translation.en: -Vince, thanks for being here tonight. -Thanks for having me.
translation.zh:
‎-文斯 谢谢你今晚来上节目
‎-谢谢邀请

translation.en: So, Vince, is it true the Sixers brought in Bo Cruz,
translation.zh:
‎文斯 76人队是否真的
‎将遭到过伤人指控的

translation.en: who has a history of assault, to play in the combine?
translation.zh:
‎博·克鲁兹找来
‎让他参加联合选秀？

translation.en: [Vin] No. Bo Cruz has no affiliation with the 76ers.
translation.zh:
‎没这回事 博·克鲁兹
‎跟76人队没有任何关系

translation.en: He was brought over here by a disgruntled employee, Stanley Sugerman.
translation.zh:
‎他是被一名心怀不满的员工
‎斯坦利·苏格曼找来的

translation.en: I specifically told Mr. Sugerman not to bring him over.
translation.zh:
‎我还专门吩咐过
‎苏格曼先生不要把他带过来

translation.en: He lied to the organization and to this young man.
translation.zh: ‎他欺骗了球队和这个年轻人

translation.en: Mr. Sugerman's selfish behavior has been part of his track record.
He's been let go. He's no longer part of the 76ers.
translation.zh:
‎他被解雇了
‎已经不是76人队的员工了

translation.en: [Anthony] Vince, we loved your father. Thank you for bringing this story to us.
translation.zh:
‎文斯 我们都爱你的父亲
‎谢谢你将这件事告诉我们

translation.en: Hey, Bo. Just get in the car, man. Let me talk to you.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 阿博 ‎上车吧 我们谈谈

translation.en: What are you gonna do? Walk to Spain? Just please, let me--
translation.zh:
‎你想怎么样？
‎走路去西班牙吗？拜托你让我…

translation.en: -You fucking lied to me! -I know.
translation.zh:
‎-你他妈的骗我！
‎-好的 我知道

translation.en: -You lied to me. -All right. He's all right.
translation.zh:
‎-你他妈骗我 我为你辞掉了工作！
‎-没事 他没事

translation.en: I quit my job for you! You said "trust," and I fucking trust you.
translation.zh:
‎-你他妈骗我 我为你辞掉了工作！
‎-没事 他没事 ‎你让我信任你 我信了

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -You gambled with my life!
-It wasn't a gamble. It was a sure thing. -It's fucking over.
translation.zh: ‎不是赌博 我有把握 ‎结束了 我们分道扬镳 听到了吗？

translation.en: You and me is fucking over! You hear me? Over!
translation.zh:
‎结束了 我们分道扬镳 听到了吗？ ‎-结束了！
‎-嘿 别这样

translation.en: -Hey. No. Just stop. Right now. Please. -[police siren whooping]
translation.zh:
‎-结束了！
‎-嘿 别这样 ‎住手 拜托了

translation.en: Don't throw it all away.
I'm begging you, just let go of me. Get in the car. It's not worth it.
translation.zh: ‎我求你了 放开我 上车 ‎这样不值得 为了我不值得 住手

translation.en: I'm not worth it. Just stop. Okay.
translation.zh: ‎这样不值得 为了我不值得 住手 ‎好吧

translation.en: All right. Get in the car.
-[officer] Everything okay here? -Hey, guys. Yeah. Everything's good.
translation.zh:
‎-没事吧？
‎-你们好 对 没事

translation.en: When Lucia was two…
her mom, Maria, asked me for her.
translation.zh: ‎她母亲玛利亚让我把露西娅给她

translation.en: She didn't wanna share custody anymore.
I asked her, "Why?"
She told me it was her boyfriend.
He told her they can get money from the government if she got Lucia.
translation.zh:
‎他对她说 如果她得到露西娅
‎政府就会给他们发钱

translation.en: So…
I went to his home.
I swear, I just wanna talk to him.
translation.zh: ‎我发誓 我本来只想跟他谈谈

translation.en: I know I make a mistake.
But I'm not how they say I am.
I get it.
You don't get shit, man.
You live in your perfect world, with your perfect family.
translation.zh: ‎你住在完美的世界中 家庭幸福美满

translation.en: One night, after a game at Villanova, we went to a party.
translation.zh: ‎有天晚上 在维拉诺瓦大学打完比赛 ‎我们去参加一个派对

translation.en: Me and Leon.
And on the way home, I…
I had a few drinks in me.
I looked down at the radio.
When I looked back up, I saw a telephone pole.
translation.zh: ‎抬头的时候 我看见一根电线杆

translation.en: I shot my hand out
to stop Leon from flying through the windshield.
translation.zh: ‎阻止利昂撞破挡风玻璃飞出去

translation.en: He still got banged up a little bit, but my hand was pulp.
translation.zh:
‎他还是被撞了一下
‎但我的手撞得稀烂

translation.en: I cost Leon and all my teammates a shot at the NCAA title that year.
translation.zh: ‎我让利昂和全部队友失去了 ‎那年夺得大学生篮球联赛冠军的机会

translation.en: I got to think about that.
I mean, really, really marinate in it
for six months in jail.
Everything I worked for.
My whole life.
Everything I wanted.
Gone.
[Stanley] Half the fucking list are favors!
translation.zh:
‎名单上有一半的人都是凭人情
‎现在我不要求你卖人情

translation.en: I'm not asking for a favor. This guy can play!
translation.zh:
‎名单上有一半的人都是凭人情
‎现在我不要求你卖人情 ‎这家伙打得很好！

translation.en: Everybody keeps saying that. That--
But you don't know the whole story.
He's-- Meet the kid!
Just set it up! I'll bring him anywhere! Anywhere! He'll play anyone!
translation.zh:
‎安排一下！让我带他去哪儿都行！
‎随便什么地方！跟谁打都行！

translation.en: Will you-- Yes. Ryan!
Yes, I know. I know.
And you almost didn't let Damian Lillard play!
translation.zh:
‎当初你们差点
‎没让达米恩·利拉德入选

translation.en: Right! So, you do make mistakes!
Don't make a mistake on this kid. I'm begging you, pal. For…
translation.zh:
‎别在这个孩子身上犯错
‎我求你了 伙计 为了…

translation.en: For your sake, not just mine!
translation.zh: ‎为了你自己 不只是为了我！

translation.en: God damn it. I spoke at your father's camp every year!
translation.zh:
‎见鬼 我每年都在
‎你父亲的活动上讲话

translation.en: And I never asked for anything back! Okay?
translation.zh: ‎我从未要求你还我人情！好吗？

translation.en: So I'm asking you now for something! Please help me!
Jesus Christ!
You know what? I have…
been in this league for 30 years, and it's like I'm nothing.
translation.zh: ‎我在联盟混了30年了 现在感觉… ‎我无足轻重

translation.en: It's like I wasn't even here.
Stanley, it's not about the last play.
translation.zh: ‎斯坦利 上一场比赛 ‎不重要

translation.en: It's about the next one, right?
translation.zh: ‎重要的是下一场比赛 对吧？

translation.en: That's if you're in the game, T. I wasn't even in the game.
translation.zh:
‎那要能上场才行 阿特
‎我已经不在场上了

translation.en: [softly] It's okay.
It's okay.
Hey. Wake up.
-You fell asleep in the chair. -[sighs]
Yeah?
Okay.
-Hey, Dad, I was thinking-- -Just a second, let me finish this.
translation.zh:
‎-嘿 爸爸 我在想…
‎-等一下 让我发完这条短信

translation.en: Stan, you're gonna give yourself a heart attack.
translation.zh: ‎斯坦 你这样会心脏病发作的 ‎是啊

translation.en: -People just need to see him play, right? -Certain people. Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎只要让大家
‎看到他打球就行了 对吧？ ‎某些人 是的

translation.en: Well, remember that video you showed me of your doctor friend?
translation.zh:
‎还记得你给我看的
‎你那个博士朋友的视频吗？

translation.en: -[Stanley] My doctor friend? -[Teresa chuckles]
We take the right one home from the hospital?
translation.zh: ‎我们是不是从医院抱错孩子了？

translation.en: [Teresa] That's Dr. J. He's not a real doctor.
translation.zh: ‎他叫J博士 亲爱的 他不是真的博士

translation.en: Oh. Well, whatever. That video has, like, two million views.
translation.zh: ‎无所谓啦 那个视频有两百万次观看

translation.en: -I was thinking-- -I can't ask him to do that.
translation.zh:
‎-我在想…
‎-我不能要求他那样做

translation.en: Well, I can.
-[Stanley] No, no. -[Teresa] No, I'm gonna ask him.
translation.zh:
‎-我可以
‎-不 ‎不 我要请他帮忙

translation.en: Hey, sweetie. It's T.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 亲爱的 我是阿特

translation.en: This is gonna be good.
[man] Hey, guys.
I was hoping you could help us out with something.
-Yo, is that who I think it is? -Yeah, that's Dr. J.
translation.zh: ‎他是那个人吗？ ‎是的 他是J博士 没错

translation.en: [boy] Yo, Doc! Say "what's up" for my story!
translation.zh:
‎-博士 为我的快拍说一声“大家好”！
‎-哟

translation.en: Yo. That's my friend Bo Cruz over there. They call him the Boa.
translation.zh:
‎-博士 为我的快拍说一声“大家好”！
‎-哟 ‎那是我的朋友博·克鲁兹 ‎大家都叫他蟒蛇 知道为什么吗？

translation.en: You know why they call him that?
translation.zh: ‎大家都叫他蟒蛇 知道为什么吗？

translation.en: Because he squeezes the life out of his prey.
[Stanley] So, guys, here's the deal.
translation.zh: ‎大家听着 是这样的 我这里有钱

translation.en: I got money here. He's gonna go out on the court.
translation.zh: ‎大家听着 是这样的 我这里有钱 ‎他将上场

translation.en: Somebody gets a shot off him and can hit the rim,
translation.zh: ‎谁能在他的防守下投篮击中篮筐

translation.en: I'll give you 50 bucks.
If you put a bucket in against this guy, we'll give you 100 bucks.
translation.zh:
‎如果能在他的防守下得分
‎我们就给他100块

translation.en: If you beat him in a game of one-on-one to five,
translation.zh:
‎如果能在一对一的较量中
‎率先拿到五分

translation.en: we'll give you 1,000 bucks. What do you say?
translation.zh: ‎我们就给他一千块 怎么样？

translation.en: -[excited chatter] -I got next.
All right. Let's go.
We got one!
Holy shit. Bo Cruz. Where did this kid come from?
translation.zh:
‎我去！博·克鲁兹
‎这小子从哪儿冒出来的？

translation.en: Yo, Bo Cruz. I wish I had you on my Rutgers team in the '70s.
translation.zh:
‎博·克鲁兹 要是我70年代的
‎破纪录球队中有你就好了

translation.en: We talkin' about practice? Man don't need no practice.
translation.zh: ‎还说什么训练 这家伙不需要训练

translation.en: A legend in the making. You heard it from your man AI.
translation.zh:
‎他是未来的传奇
‎这是你们的好兄弟AI说的

translation.en: If you not here, you not nowhere.
translation.zh: ‎不来这里看看 实在是太可惜了

translation.en: [Dan Patrick] …been taking on streetball legends, NBA players. Doesn't care.
translation.zh:
‎…对阵街球高手和NBA球员
‎他轻松自如

translation.en: Why aren't they inviting him to the combine?
translation.zh: ‎他们为何不邀请他参加联合选秀？

translation.en: That's why you have the combine for players like this.
translation.zh: ‎联合选秀就是为这种球员而设

translation.en: Let the world see this talent.
It's ridiculous what he's doing out there. This ain't no gimmick, this real.
translation.zh:
‎他的球技出神入化
‎听着 这不是噱头 这是真的

translation.en: The Boa needs to get to the combine.
As much as it pains me to say this, you two guys are right.
translation.zh: ‎虽然我不想承认 但你们说得对

translation.en: This kid Bo Cruz is special.
Bo Cruz. How does it feel getting into the combine?
translation.zh:
‎博·克鲁兹
‎进入联合选秀是什么感觉？

translation.en: The combine? I'm in the combine? You are as of 30 minutes ago.
translation.zh:
‎-联合选秀？我进入联合选秀了？
‎-30分钟前进入的

translation.en: Have you thought about what team you wanna play for?
translation.zh: ‎你想过要为哪支球队效力吗？

translation.en: -It'd be an honor to play for any team. -I tell you what.
translation.zh:
‎-加入任何一支球队都是我的荣幸
‎-我来说吧

translation.en: He could be playing for the Sixers right now,
translation.zh: ‎本来他应该已经在为76人队效力了

translation.en: but Vince Merrick didn't want him. He specifically said that. You remember?
translation.zh: ‎但文斯·梅里克不要他 ‎这是他特别吩咐的 你还记得吗？

translation.en: Anthony, you remember that, right?
-You were interviewing him. -That's right.
translation.zh:
‎-当时你在采访他
‎-是的 没错

translation.en: He's 22. You're messing with his life.
translation.zh: ‎他才22岁 你毁了他的前途

translation.en: -What kind of ballplayer-- -Hang on.
translation.zh:
‎-拜托 你觉得他是什么样的…
‎-等一下

translation.en: Have some respect for your profession. Get the whole story next time.
translation.zh:
‎请你尊重你的职业
‎下次别再片面报道了

translation.en: What kind of ballplayer-- I'll answer that question.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得他是什么样的球员？
‎我来回答这个问题

translation.en: This guy is as if Scottie Pippen and a wolf had a baby,
translation.zh:
‎他就像是斯科蒂·皮蓬
‎跟一头狼生的孩子

translation.en: and Lisa Leslie raised him.
And Allen Iverson was the babysitter.
It gets weird, that stuff. But you handled it great.
translation.zh: ‎刚才有点怪怪的 但你应对得很好

translation.en: What else is bothering you? Tell me.
Nothing. See you tomorrow.
Yeah.
[Teresa] So, he got into the combine, and he's not excited?
translation.zh: ‎他进了联合选秀 却一点都不兴奋？

translation.en: He's in his own head. He's not telling me anything.
translation.zh: ‎他有心事 ‎他什么都不跟我说

translation.en: -[sighs] -Well, maybe he's just sad.
Eh. I think he's overwhelmed. The pressure's getting to him.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得他是不知所措
‎毕竟压力太大了

translation.en: Mm-mm. I bet it's the kid. Lucia.
translation.zh: ‎肯定是因为那个孩子 ‎露西娅

translation.en: I mean, he's never been away from her.
Like ever.
[Stanley] Okay, here we go.
Superstars don't carry their own bags. I got this.
translation.zh: ‎巨星不会自己拎行李 我来吧

translation.en: I'll meet you in the lobby in one hour, okay?
translation.zh: ‎一小时后我在大堂等你 好吗？

translation.en: This is very, very good.
Ray Hancock can't stop working his ass off.
translation.zh: ‎雷·汉考克工作起来就是这么拼命

translation.en: Come on. Come on. Come with me.
Hey.
When you train for a marathon,
you don't run 20 miles the day before the race. You do nothing.
translation.zh:
‎不会在比赛前一天跑30公里
‎而是会好好休息

translation.en: All we could do now is get you hurt or wear you out.
translation.zh: ‎现在训练只会让你受伤或筋疲力尽

translation.en: So we're gonna do this.
-[Bo] Lucia! -Papi!
[Stanley] Boa challenge is still trending.
People are excited to see what you're gonna do tomorrow.
Look at this. Look at this.
You think I know that many people? This is all for you, pal.
translation.zh: ‎你觉得我会认识这么多人吗？ ‎他们都是支持你的 伙计

translation.en: -That's for us. -Okay, it's for us. Let's get 'em.
translation.zh: ‎是支持我们 ‎好吧 支持我们 让他们开开眼

translation.en: Tomorrow, they're gonna be watching you. Every move you make, the camera's on you.
translation.zh: ‎明天他们会考察你 ‎你的每一个动作都会被拍下来

translation.en: And it's not just about how you play. It's the intangibles.
translation.zh:
‎而且不只是你的球技
‎还有无形的东西

translation.en: More important than making a shot is how you handle missing a shot.
translation.zh:
‎比投篮命中更重要的
‎是你投篮失误后的心理素质

translation.en: Shit's gonna go wrong. So what?
translation.zh: ‎失误是难免的 那又如何？

translation.en: You've dealt with adversity your whole goddamn life.
translation.zh:
‎-你一辈子都在面对逆境
‎-是的

translation.en: -Yeah. -[Stanley] It's Bo's turn.
translation.zh:
‎-你一辈子都在面对逆境
‎-是的 ‎轮到你出头了

translation.en: You're nervous, huh?
It's all right.
Hey. Clyde Drexler used to get so nervous before games

‎嘿 克莱德·德雷克斯勒
‎以前经常在比赛前

translation.en: that he'd actually faint.

translation.en: I'm not kidding you. The guy did it so much
translation.zh:
‎紧张到晕倒 我没开玩笑 ‎由于他动不动就晕倒
‎他的队友不得不随时跟着他

translation.en: his teammates followed him around so they could catch him.
translation.zh:
‎由于他动不动就晕倒
‎他的队友不得不随时跟着他 ‎以便扶着他 后来这成了一种仪式

translation.en: It became kind of a ritual.
translation.zh: ‎以便扶着他 后来这成了一种仪式

translation.en: It's good to be nervous. It means you give a shit.

translation.en: -All right? -All right.
-Mama, you'll get him to sleep? -Okay.
translation.zh:
‎伯母 让他早点睡觉 ‎-好
‎-好

translation.en: Okay. Lucia, go easy on the Pringles.
translation.zh:
‎-好
‎-好 ‎露西娅 少吃点薯片

translation.en: -All right. Adiós. -[Paola laughs]
-[Paola] Adiós. -Bo Cruz.
You're gonna Cruz-ify them tomorrow. Huh?
-It's still not funny. Get out. -It's no good?
translation.zh:
‎-还是不好笑 出去
‎-不好笑吗？

translation.en: -Good night, my man. -Good night.
Crush 'em.
-[woman] So, this is their shot? -[man] It is a big deal to be here.

[man] This guy? Yeah, I've seen him play. He's got a lot of talent. He's got it all.
translation.zh: ‎他吗？ ‎我看过他打球 ‎他很有天分 技术很全面

translation.en: He can do a bit of everything. I don't think he needs any advice from me.
translation.zh: ‎他很有天分 技术很全面 ‎我觉得他不需要我的建议

translation.en: Yeah, most guys in your position would not be here.
translation.zh:
‎处在你这个位置的人
‎大多数不会来这里

translation.zh:
‎你已经被选中了
‎所以你的目标是什么？

‎大杀八方 称霸全场
‎让别人知道我的厉害

translation.en: You're an iceberg.
Focus. Kick some ass.
That's good.
Have fun out there. Where do you wanna sit?

translation.en: -Double D! I see you! -Yeah! Hey, Leon.
Come on, guys.
Hey, yo, Stan. He can fly. Damn. He can fly, man.

Thanks, Khris.
It's from football.
Okay. Well, then, soccer is good.
I hate soccer. I can't say that. I really do hate that sport.

‎我讨厌足球 我不能这么说
‎我真的很讨厌足球

He can shoot.
Olé, bitch.
Fran Fraschilla here at the NBA draft combine.

‎博·克鲁兹和克米特·威尔茨

‎早在克米特打业余比赛时

‎但博·克鲁兹这个孩子

‎没有我不认识的国际球员

Good. Good. Good.

Ron Artest?

Look at me.

All that you do for Lucia, for me,

translation.en: it's never enough.
All this love…
and no love for yourself.
When I first saw you here…
the day we arrived,
you looked…
different.
You looked lighter,
like the weight was lifted.
And I think that Stanley does for you
what you do for us.
He put all the weight on him
so you can be you.
He is your oak tree.

Coaching you.

Mr. Cruz Missile.

Sorry.

Okay. Excuse me. I'm sorry. Sorry.

‎-没事 他们是我叫来的

translation.en: -Okay. -Y'all are good.
-I still need that. Your phone. -The phone?

-Hey, Mark. -Good to see you.
How are you? Right on. Aaron.

Trae. Trae. Trae.
God damn.

Bo. Come get it.
